download.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to move information or programs from a computer network to a small computer
download.translation[0].definitions[0].e: games that can be downloaded free from the Internet
download.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a computer file or program that has been downloaded, or the process of downloading it
download.translation[1].definitions[0].e: We’ve got reviews and downloads of the latest business software.
download.translation[2].definitions[0].d: to move computer software or information from one computer to another, usually from a large computer to a smaller one
download.translation[2].definitions[0].e: If you can log on to the network, you can download files from there.
I downloaded the games from the Internet for free.
download.translation[3].definitions[0].d: a computer program or file that has been downloaded, or the process of doing this
download.translation[3].definitions[0].e: You can get downloads of the nightly news from the BBC’s home page.
